titles.title: VICTORY Act
VICTORY Act
Volunteers in Contract Tracing or Recovery Act
A bill to utilize national service programs to directly respond to the novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19) outbreak.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Corporation for National and Community Service
Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Volunteers in Contract Tracing or Recovery Act or the VICTORY Act
This bill allows national service entities to modify existing grant programs to carry out activities to respond to a national emergency, including the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) emergency.
